name: EasyChatManager
tagline: A chat management plugin made for people who like easy.
body:
# EasyChatManger
EasyChatManager or ECM is a chat management plugin made for people who like easy. This plugin is still in development but will have some major things added to it I think you all will enjoy. From clearing chat to changing chat format, ECM has your back.

## TODO List
- Spy on commands
- Pergroup chat formats.
- Messaging System
- Mailing System

## Current Features
- Mute the chat
- Clear the chat
- Format chat (with colors)
- and MORE to come
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
